alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 03 at 2:57PM MDT until April 06 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Much of Carbon County including Rawlins, Muddy Gap, Shirley Basin, Medicine Bow, and the Ferris and Seminoe Mountains. * WHEN...Noon MDT Monday until 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin
